str2: Three times. Adverb from treis; three times.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and histemi; to remove, i.e. instigate to revolt; usually to desist, desert, etc.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
